title: Verde Caffe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Organic, Mediterranean, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, European, Fusion
description: Cozy restaurant-pub in the city center offering lunch and dinner options, pre-dinner cocktails, coffee, smoothies and shakes, vegan cakes etc. Most dishes are 100% vegan, while a few use eggs and milk or cream. Cakes are made with soy milk and are 100% vegan.
